description: This block and tenant association has worked with the neighborhood youth to build a picnic area and vegetable garden on the corner of Frederick Douglas Boulevard and 152nd Street  Founded in 1978, this garden contains mature trees and shrubs, as well as permanent in ground benches and chess tables.  The group that has stewardship over the garden have been dwindling in number as residents have grown older or have moved away.  With a little bit of work this garden would make a very nice corner pocket park.
name: Bradhurst Avenue Tenants Association
